Some Good Books to Learn Statistics, Data Visualizations, Modeling, and Development of Data Science Projects -

04. [Python for Data Science](https://aeturrell.github.io/python4DS/welcome.html)

05. [A Practical Guide to Macroeconomic Data with R and Python](https://quantamental-python.com/)

06. [STAT 545](https://stat545.com/)

07. [STAT 545 @UBC](https://stat545.stat.ubc.ca/)

08. [DevOps for Data Science](https://do4ds.com/)

09. [Happy Git and GitHub for the useR](https://happygitwithr.com/)
